nodes.text: Around 21 BBY, this Quarren lived on the ocean-wide planet of Dac and participated in the Battle of Mon Cala.
During the Battle of Mon Cala, this Quarren was under command of Separatist Karkarodon commander Riff Tamson and fought the Mon Calamari alongside fellow Quarren and aqua droids.

During the battle, this soldier had the opportunity to attack Jedi Knight Anakin Skywalker while the latter was distracted by other attacking enemy troops. The Quarren succeeded in grabbing onto the distracted Jedi's diving helmet, blinding him, while another Quarren soldier attacked him from the front. In the end, Skywalker managed to stab this Quarren through the abdomen and kill the other soldier. When this Quarren fell to the bottom of the ocean, he also dragged Skywalker's helmet off, causing him to suffocate until his Padawan, Ahsoka Tano, arrived and retrieved the helmet.
The soldier first appeared in the Star Wars: The Clone Wars TV series season four episode Water War and was voiced by Phil LaMarr.
